languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, с радостью докладываю, что осмотр систем корабля завершен, а выявленные неполадки устранены. Корабль готов покинуть Футфол. Команда ждет ваших дальнейших указаний, также есть ряд проблем, которые необходимо решить".

"Lord Captain, I am pleased to report that the inspections have been completed and all identified system failures have been resolved. The voidship is ready to depart Footfall. The crew is waiting for your further instructions, and there are also a number of issues that need to be addressed."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, с радостью докладываю, что осмотр систем корабля завершен, а выявленные неполадки устранены. Корабль готов покинуть Футфол. Команда ждет ваших дальнейших указаний, также есть ряд проблем, которые необходимо решить".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, I am pleased to report that the repairs have been completed. The voidship is ready to leave Footfall. The crew is waiting for your further instructions, and there are also a number of issues that need to be addressed. Would you like to order an officers' meeting?"

"Lord Captain, I am pleased to report that the repairs have been completed. The voidship is ready to leave Footfall. The crew is waiting for your further instructions, and there are also a number of issues that need to be addressed. Would you like to order an officers' meeting?"

"Lord Captain, I am pleased to report that the repairs have been completed. The voidship is ready to depart Footfall. The crew is waiting for your further instructions, and there are also a number of issues that need to be addressed. Would you like to convene an officers' meeting?"

"Lord Captain, I am pleased to report that the repairs have been completed. The voidship is ready to depart Footfall. The crew is waiting for your further instructions, and there are also a number of issues that need to be addressed. Would you like to convene an officers' meeting?"

"Lord Captain, I am pleased to report that the inspections have been completed and all identified system failures have been resolved. The voidship is ready to depart Footfall. The crew is waiting for your further instructions, and there are also a number of issues that need to be addressed."

"Lord Captain, I am pleased to report that the inspections have been completed and all identified system failures have been resolved. The voidship is ready to depart Footfall. The crew is waiting for your further instructions, and there are also a number of issues that need to be addressed."

languages.text: “舰长大人，我很高兴地向您报告，检查工作已经完成，所有发现的系统故障都已经修理完成。虚空舰已经准备就绪，可以离开落脚港了。船员正在等待您的进一步指示，此外，还有一些问题需要解决。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I am pleased to report that the inspections have been completed and all identified system failures have been resolved. The voidship is ready to depart Footfall. The crew is waiting for your further instructions, and there are also a number of issues that need to be addressed."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，我很高兴地向您报告，维修工作已经完成。虚空舰已经准备就绪，可以离开落脚港了。船员正在等待您的进一步指示，此外，还有一些问题需要解决。”

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, me alegro de poder anunciar que las inspecciones han terminado y hemos resuelto todos los fallos de sistema. La nave del vacío puede partir de Paso. La tripulación espera órdenes. También hay una serie de asuntos que atender».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I am pleased to report that the inspections have been completed and all identified system failures have been resolved. The voidship is ready to depart Footfall. The crew is waiting for your further instructions, and there are also a number of issues that need to be addressed."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, me alegro de poder anunciar que las reparaciones están listas. La nave del vacío puede partir de Paso. La tripulación espera órdenes. También hay una serie de asuntos que atender».

languages.text: "Lord Captain, ich freue mich, berichten zu können, dass die Inspektionen abgeschlossen und alle identifizierten Systemfehler behoben wurden. Das Raumschiff ist bereit, Footfall zu verlassen. Die Crew wartet auf weitere Anweisungen. Überdies gibt es einige Probleme, die es zu lösen gilt."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I am pleased to report that the inspections have been completed and all identified system failures have been resolved. The voidship is ready to depart Footfall. The crew is waiting for your further instructions, and there are also a number of issues that need to be addressed."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, ich freue mich, berichten zu können, dass die Inspektionen abgeschlossen und alle identifizierten Systemfehler behoben wurden. Das Raumschiff ist bereit, Footfall zu verlassen. Die Crew wartet auf weitere Anweisungen. Überdies gibt es einige Probleme, die es zu lösen gilt."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, j'ai le plaisir de vous annoncer que l'inspection est terminée et que toutes les pannes identifiées ont été réparées. Le vaisseau est prêt à quitter Castel. L'équipage attend vos ordres, mais nous avons cependant un certain nombre de problèmes à régler. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I am pleased to report that the inspections have been completed and all identified system failures have been resolved. The voidship is ready to depart Footfall. The crew is waiting for your further instructions, and there are also a number of issues that need to be addressed."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, j'ai le plaisir de vous annoncer que les réparations sont terminées. Le vaisseau est prêt à quitter Castel. L'équipage attend vos ordres, mais nous avons cependant un certain nombre de problèmes à régler. »

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、嬉しい報告です。検査が完了して、突き止めていた全てのシステム障害を解決しました。ヴォイドシップは、フットフォールを出発する準備が整いました。クルーは次の指示を待っていて、対応が必要な問題も数多くあります」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I am pleased to report that the inspections have been completed and all identified system failures have been resolved. The voidship is ready to depart Footfall. The crew is waiting for your further instructions, and there are also a number of issues that need to be addressed."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、嬉しい報告です。検査が完了して、突き止めていた全てのシステム障害を解決しました。ヴォイドシップは、フットフォールを出発する準備が整いました。クルーは次の指示を待っていて、対応が必要な問題も数多くあります」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, muayenelerin tamamlandığını ve tüm tanımlanan sistem arızalarının çözüldüğünü bildirmekten mutluluk duyarım. Uçsuz gemisi, Binliman'dan ayrılmaya hazır. Mürettebat talimatlarınızı bekliyor ve ayrıca ilgilenilmesi gereken bir dizi mesele söz konusu."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I am pleased to report that the inspections have been completed and all identified system failures have been resolved. The voidship is ready to depart Footfall. The crew is waiting for your further instructions, and there are also a number of issues that need to be addressed."
